name.task.description: The type of operation for the Flux image generator

name.generate.description: The type of operation for the Flux image generator

name.edits.description: The type of operation for the Flux image generator

name.type.description: The content type of the FLux image to be generated, such as 'link', 'text', etc.

name.imageUrl.description: The name of the reference image

name.failure.description: The failure status of the task

name.failureReason.description: The reason for the task failure

name.traceId.description: The trace ID of the task

name.createdAt.description: The date and time when the Flux image was generated

name.numbers.description: The number of images to be generated

name.ratio.description: The name of the ratio parameter

name.model.description: The model version used to generate the image

name.fluxBot.description: The name of the Flux image generator

description.numbers.message: Specify the number of images to generate, with a value range of: 1-4.

description.quality.message: Specify the quality of the generated images, with a value range of: 1-100.

description.prompt.message: The prompt words for generating Flux images

description.imageUrl.message: In the task of creating an edited image, an image must be uploaded.

status.pending.description: The waiting status of the task

status.processing.description: The processing status of the task

placeholder.select.description: Placeholder text in the selection field

placeholder.prompt.message: Enter the prompt for the style of the image to be generated, e.g., a white siamese cat
placeholder.prompt.description: Placeholder text in the prompt field

button.generate.description: Button text for generating Flux images

button.uploadImageUrl.description: Button text for uploading an image (keep short: Upload)

button.extend.description: Button text for extending an image

button.viewImage.description: Button text for viewing the generated Flux image

button.download.description: Button text for downloading an image

message.downloadImage.description: Open image in a new window

message.uploadReferencesExceed.message: You can upload a maximum of 5 images
message.uploadReferencesExceed.description: Error message when the number of uploaded images exceeds the limit

message.uploadReferencesSuccess.description: Success message when an image is uploaded successfully

message.uploadReferencesError.message: Image upload failed, please try again later
message.uploadReferencesError.description: Error message when image upload fails

message.startingTask.description: Message when the drawing task starts

message.startTaskSuccess.description: Success message when the task is successfully initiated

message.startTaskFailed.message: Failed to initiate task, please contact the administrator
message.startTaskFailed.description: Error message when the drawing task fails to start

message.usedUp.message: Your credits have been used up, please purchase more credits to continue using

message.generating.description: Message when the image is being generated

message.downloadVideo.description: Message when the image is being generated

message.extendVideo.description: Message when the image is being generated

message.uploadVideoExceed.message: The number of uploaded first frame images exceeds the limit
message.uploadVideoExceed.description: Error message when the number of uploaded first frame images exceeds the limit

message.uploadVideoSizeExceed.description: Error message when the uploaded file size exceeds 10MB!

message.uploadVideoTypeFailed.message: Uploaded file must be in MP4 format!
message.uploadVideoTypeFailed.description: Error message when the uploaded file is not in MP4 format!

message.uploadStartImageExceed.message: The number of uploaded reference images exceeds the limit
message.uploadStartImageExceed.description: Error message when the number of uploaded reference images exceeds the limit

message.uploadEndImageExceed.message: The number of uploaded last frame images exceeds the limit
message.uploadEndImageExceed.description: Error message when the number of uploaded last frame images exceeds the limit

message.uploadStartImageError.description: Error message when uploading reference images fails

message.uploadVideoError.description: Error message when uploading the first frame image fails

message.uploadEndImageError.message: Failed to upload last frame image
message.uploadEndImageError.description: Error message when uploading last frame images fails

message.uploadDocumentsError.description: Error message when uploading documents fails

message.noOperations.description: Message when there are no available operations

message.noTasks.message: No historical tasks, please click on the left to generate an image
message.noTasks.description: Message when there are no tasks
